verbs.description: [ARG0: peyton] [V: manning] congratulates drew brees for breaking his passing yards record former indianapolis colts and denver broncos quarterback peyton manning ‘ begrudgingly’ sent along a congratulatory message to new orleans saints quarterback drew brees for breaking the all - time passing yards record manning had previously held manning was shown in a video slicing tomatoes on a cutting board when an off - camera voice informs him that brees has broken more new orleans saints drew brees nfl peyton manning
